categories: Category:Articles that are known by a nickname

nodes.text: "Green Leader" was a human male pilot that served in the Alliance to Restore the Republic during the early rebellion against the Galactic Empire. In 2 BBY, he served as leader of Green Squadron and participated during the Battle of Atollon where he flew a BTL-A4 Y-wing assault starfighter/bomber and made bombing runs on one of Grand Admiral Thrawn's Star Destroyers.
The character first appeared in the Star Wars Rebels season three finale "Zero Hour", where his voice was provided by Dave Filoni.
